version_description:
With BHIM SBI Pay you can now do recharges, order food, pay utility bills & buy local deals.

Recharge: Prepaid, Postpaid & DTH
• Track all your recharges at one place
• Get reminders for postpaid bills

Food: Order Food from your Favourite Restaurants
• Compare & Use Swiggy, Freshmenu, Faasos, Behrouz Biryani at one place
• Browse menu, add food items to cart, pay from your account & get food delivered

Bill Payments: Hassle free payment of Electricity, Gas, Broadband, Landline & Water Bills
• Fetch your bill using your customer id or unique identification number of bill
• Get Reminder for utility bills
• Pay for 70+ popular bills

Local Deals: Explore all local deals at one place
• Notification of latest deals
• Get discounts on Buffets, Spa & salons, weekend activities & more

Merchant Mode - Collection of payments
Due to regulatory guidelines pay to aadhaar functionality has been removed.

· Search, Compare and Book -
Flights, Hotels and Buses at best rates!

· Earn instant cashbacks on each booking!

1. UPI 2.0
a. Mandate creation and acceptance.
b. Invoice in the Box
c. Signed Intent and Signed QR
2. IPO - SEBI has decided to introduce the use of UPI as a payment mechanism with Application Supported by Block Amount (ASBA) for applications in public issues by retail investors through intermediaries.
3. Performance improvements and usability features
a. Feedback Screen
b. Last Login details
c. SBI UPI Support contact details
d. Invitation to download BHIM SBI Pay application
e. Clickable in-app banners
f. Deep linking push notification
Recharge, Bill Payment, Hotel, Bus, Flights, Food & Local Offers.

- PMCares donation using Virtual Account Number and IFSC
- Cooling Period of 48 Hours for raising a dispute.

Security Enhancements
- New customer onboarding allowed on iOS version 13.4 and above.
- New customer onboarding allowed on iPhone 6S and above.
